EmailTemplate.subject: MPA Systems offers an excellent Disaster Recovery Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MPA System offers an excellent Disaster Recovery Program for those times when a disaster strikes, such as a fire, flood, tornado or hurricane and you are unable to serve your customers.
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
If you are a member of our Disaster Recovery Program, MPA Systems will provide you with a 14’x70’ modular financial building which includes the following:
· Furniture (desks, chairs, filing cabinets, tables and credenzas)
· Telephone system (8 multi-line phones)
· Cameras and alarms
· Teller stations with under counter steel pedestals
· Two ADA compliant restrooms
· Enclosed offices (1 or 2)
· One dual head night depository unit
· One receiving safe
· Building wired for computers CAT5
· Heating/AC 5 ton unit
· Drive-up window with bullet resistant glass with deal drawer
· Free use of building up to 6 months
In addition to our standard Disaster Recovery Program, we also offer a Connectivity Package which provides you with voice and data transmission capabilities while your normal communication lines are restored.
I will gladly provide you with a quote!
Looking forward to hearing from you soon –
David Strong
Disaster Recovery Sales Representative MPA Systems, a business unit of BOXX Modular D: 469.568.2137 | C: 214.622.3982 Toll Free: 1.888.233.1584 3475 High River Rd Fort Worth, TX 76155
